SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into commodity_image (sku_collect_id, path, name, is_main_img, is_attr_img, upload_by, upload_time) values (#{skuCollectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMainImg,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isAttrImg,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{uploadBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update commodity_image set sku_collect_id = #{skuCollectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_main_img = #{isMainImg,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_attr_img = #{isAttrImg,jdbcType=TINYINT}, upload_by = #{uploadBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where image_id = #{imageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select image_id, sku_collect_id, path, name, is_main_img, is_attr_img, upload_by, upload_time from commodity_image where image_id = #{imageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select image_id, sku_collect_id, path, name, is_main_img, is_attr_img, upload_by, upload_time from commodity_image
